message: Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced 55-45 split.  Let's settle this quickly.
I'm willing to compromise, 58-42 is as low as I can go.
Time is running out, and the money is losing value. I'm proposing 53-47.  This is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
I'm still willing to compromise, 57-43 is a good deal considering the inflation hit me less than you.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My offer is now 52-48.  Take it before inflation eats away even more of our potential gains!
